item.title: Need Freelance Videographer in Danville, CA - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a freelance videographer to help some of our Bay Area businesses create authentic social media content. We would need this help on a monthly basis (2 hour video shoot) and are rapidly growing, so we're hoping to build a long-term relationship.

The first shoot is this Wednesday (6/25) 10a-12p - please let me know if you can be available for this time.

Necessary Skills:
- Videography
- Lighting
- Audio
- Giving direction to the business owner, given the short-form video content we want to create and shot list we'll provide.

Zach

Hourly Range: $100.00-$150.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 14:44 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Videography, Video Production, Photography
Skills: Business, Videography, Video Production, Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
